item.title: HTTPS Handshake Optimization: Cutting Latency from 200ms to 50ms
item.description: Users were complaining about slow page loads. Chrome DevTools showed a TTFB (Time To First Byte) of 400ms, with HTTPS handshake alone taking 200ms. This post documents how I got that down to 50ms.
